name: Small church of Saint Anthony
description: The small Church of St. Anthony of Padua is a Catholic Church located in a country estate near the Comune of Sesto al Reghena in Friuli Venezia Giulia.The main fa√ßade is enriched by the presence of a rectangular portico, delimited by a small wall on which rest two lateral pillars and two central columns which support the triangular tympanum.The entrance door is flanked by two rectangular windows. Inside the Church there is the altar-piece which represents Saint John the Baptist and Saint Antony of Padua.
authorName: Art Aia Creatives In Residence - Topic
